description: streams from my lan server really well

An app you'll realize is obviously not of this Earth once you get a build on it, like Diggz. GOD has put this here for me, And YOU! Take advantage, man... Cuz it's Friday, you aint got no job... You ain't got SH*T to DO! And how the hell you get fired... On your day off, Craig??!
Just a bit complicated else its awesome piece of software to get any media from the world.
Thank you, alot better

The base program is fine (and legal) but it's all about what build you put on after to see it at it's best. Surprised by all the 1 star reviews, it's always been flawless on every OS I've tried it on ( mostly Linux but also Windows and a lot of Android TV boxes) Plenty of tutorials on the internet on how to set it properly, so just needs a bit of research
summary: Only as good as the build you put on afterwards

description:
This is for anyone who has patience and the will to "bake their own bread". 
I have one video addon (Seren), Real Debrid for the backend and Trakt for the watch history/recommendations. With those in tandem, its bye bye multiple gouging streaming service subscriptions. 

Those without the patience or unfortunately, time, can pay instead thorugh the eyeballs for all the 10 or so streaming services needed to see the the exclusive shows each lock away on their service
SMB is NOT even available as a connection option on my Endless Linux version of Kodi! What garbage!
summary: Release 19 killed my SMB access on Endless Linux!

description: the flatpak version on ubuntu went into a ridiculous sequence of asking about enabling plugins and what settings to use for them. after blindly clicking yes and ok for a couple of minutes(!) I killed it and uninstalled it again without ever getting to any media playback
All the great things that made this the go to on Android, no longer work
It's hard to set up, and no instructions
Could not find any game emulator there. only LibRetro compatibility addon
As you can see from reviews this flat has a long way to go to be usable.
summary: Not able to use on Clear Linux

description: Its freaking amazing if you know how to configure(addons, skins, scrappers, etc). Just one complain, there are sooo many frequent crash on all desktop versions
summary: Its amazing if you know how to configure

description: better than cable tv
summary: too many people just dont know how to add builds or wizards that work

description: Spent 10 minutes enabling add ons, and it did not work in Endless OS.

I had it all set up for IPTV/MOvieS, Is All Lost?
summary: Not Working After Updating to This Version..
